DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the intraocular pressure-lowering effect and the safety of DE-117 ophthalmic solution compared with Latanoprost ophthalmic solution in subjects with open angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase III Study Assessing the Safety and Efficacy of DE-117 Ophthalmic Solution Compared With Latanoprost Ophthalmic Solution in Subjects With OAG or OHT
DOC.criteria: Patients with open angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension in both eyes Patients at risk of progression of visual field loss Patients with severe visual field defect Patients with any diseases that preclude participation in this study for safety reasons
